## ElementHandle.contentFrame() method

Resolves to the content frame for element handles referencing iframe nodes, or null otherwise

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
contentFrame(): Promise<Frame | null>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Frame](./puppeteer.frame.md) \| null&gt;
